Name: Founders Update
Notes: Added new recipes (all founders recipes included)
Recipes resulting in more than one item now get calculated correctly (Wheels/Repair Kits)

Name: Update
Notes: Added russian localization for item names -> Check the settings

Name: Doomsday Cars and Raven's Path Update
Update
Notes: Changed optimal route calculation. The optimal route now takes paths below "buy" advised ingredients into account. Big thanks to Anraton for providing code to solve this!
Added snapshot feature to the crafting calculator. This allows you to save the current state of the calculator. Data is saved locally in your browsers web storage.
Fixed an bug in the crafting calculator which caused unwanted expanding of similar items in the tree.
Added health check endpoint to API v1 and v2 ( https://crossoutdb.com/api/v2/health ). Please use this endpoint if you want to check if the service is running.
Updated localization table. New items should now also be available with russian localization.
